description.value: This orc is touched by the orc god Gruumsh. The blood of the orc is dark red and flows quickly. Alchemists often look for this blood to create various potions. Use: A creature may use an action to drink a vial of this blood. For the next minute, the creature deals an extra 1d8 damage when it hits with a melee attack. This ability does not work for elves and half-elves.
